modulesynopsis.name: mod_bmx_vhost
modulesynopsis.description: Basic Management Extension (BMX) virtual host summary

summary.p: The mod_bmx_vhost module provides operational tallies of activity in each specific virutal host, and aggregates these tallies for the entire server.

The mod_bmx module is the core BMX module and must be loaded in order to support any BMX plugins. It provides the base functionality for satisfying BMX queries. For basic configuration and use of mod_bmx and the plugin modules, refer to that module's manual page.

section.title: mod_bmx_vhost output fields
section.p: The resulting fields in the mod_bmx_vhost output will appear as;

section.p: The available record types include the 'forever' (since the cache file was last manually purged), 'since-start' and 'since-restart' tallies.

The available Host and Port will also include grand total _ANY_ records; be aware that the specific Port will only display correctly if the ServerName directives specifies a port number (e.g. example.com:80), and will otherwise display Host=example.com,Port=Any.
